name: Fate of the Pharaoh
description:
Become the loyal Pharaoh’s adviser and help him to restore peace and prosperity in the golden cities of Egypt. Construct houses re-establish production, collect taxes and gather materials, set up production and trade, and fight crocodiles and wicked cobras. Restore Egypt to its days of glory!



  • HELP the people of ancient Egypt to restore their kingdom in this exciting time management adventure game!
  • EXPLORE the magnificent era of our history
  • 44 EXCITING levels to master and hundreds of quests
  • FIGHT dangerous cobras, scorpions, crocodiles and more!
  • EARN achievements along the way
  • MEET friends from outer space
  • 2 difficulty modes: relaxed and adventure
  • Step-by-step tutorials for beginners
